snippet: The Rangers gave up a one-goal lead in the third period and Henrik Lundqvist, who entered the night as the N.H.L.’s save percentage leader, allowed four goals.
abstract: Chicago Blackhawks defeat New York Rangers, 4-3, in NHL action.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers gave up a one-goal lead in the third period and Henrik Lundqvist, who entered the night as the N.H.L.’s save percentage leader, allowed four goals.

headline.seo: Rangers Sustain Third Loss in a Row
headline.main: Rangers Sustain Third Loss in a Row
headline.print_headline: Rangers Absorb Third Loss In Row
